reviewText: Fun. I enjoyed watching Battlebots on TV.

I loved BattleBots when I was little and was super excited when I saw this video. It's great and I loved the battles in it. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because of Y2K2, the creepy Monkey robot. I prefer the lights to start a BattleBots battle. Otherwise great Purchase and worth your money.

I would give this four or five stars because it covered the bouts very well but it wouldn't work on ANY of my 3 DVD players.  I live in USA, but I could only get it to play on my computer, otherwise I wouldn't be able to see it.  This was a big disppointment.  Just to let you know, if it doesn't play when you get it.
Bought this for my son.  He loves it watches it over and over
